name: Bacterial Vaginosis
chief_complaint: I have a fishy-smelling discharge and some itching down there.
prognosis: Excellent with proper treatment; may recur in some patients
description: Bacterial vaginosis is a common vaginal infection caused by an imbalance of naturally occurring bacterial flora, with overgrowth of anaerobic bacteria. It is not considered an STD but can increase susceptibility to other infections.
